channel.title: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section
channel.description:
[quote="Aftermath, post:1, topic:122752"]We could have actual tutorials in the tutorial section, and code snippets, autospawns, errors, and other text files in the pastebin section. I think it's a good idea because it keeps the quality level in the tutorial section by giving another place to put those types of posts. It could be something like a less formal section, and a useful place to post all of these chat logs from the IRC, errors, and cool stuff that doesn't merit having its own tutorial.
I got the original idea from Stanyer after it was posted in the tutorials section. Also, there's really no place for non-vets to post their suggestions. Perhaps we should have a General Discussion section for moparscape?[/quote]

item.title: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I dunno why everyone is jumping up and down about spam. It takes a single click to remove a topic.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section

item.title: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:7, topic:122754”]A general discussion will be helpful.
Will stop people from posting moparscape stuff on the moparisthebest general section.
However I will get some more active, I’m sure people will use it to spam their sites or servers[/quote]

Probably just as much as they do on here anyway. A general section wouldn’t hurt imo.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section

item.title: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

I clear my cookies several times a day. You’re probably always logged in to both sites.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section

item.title: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:4, topic:122754”]Because they’d have to constantly switch between domain names. Cookies aren’t tracked across the sites, so if you point someone to something they have to log in.

MoparScape and MITB are two different sites, so they should each have General Discussion sections at the very lest.[/quote]

I never have to re-login -.-

Read full topic
item.source: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section

item.title: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Moparscape.org is for development purposes, so i don’t see why moparscapers can’t use the general section of this site if they need a general section to use.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section

item.title: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

A General Discussion section couldn’t hurt. The boards are set up in a way now that allows for the easy addition/removal of sections.

I don’t think there should be a section for code snippets though.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparScape: General Discussion and Code Snippets section
